vote.title: Authorize the (1) deposit of the amount awarded by the Special Commissioners in the condemnation proceeding styled CITY OF DALLAS VS. SORAB MIRAKI, et al., Cause No. CC-21-05360-D, pending in Dallas County Court at Law No. 4, for acquisition from Sorab Miraki, of approximately 29,185 square feet of land, located on Morrell Avenue at its intersection with Sargent Road for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project; and (2) settlement of the condemnation proceeding for an amount not to exceed the award - Not to exceed $303,000.00 ($300,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,000.00) - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
